translations: v．翻新，整修：修复、清洁或重新装饰某物，使其看起来更好、功能更佳。
· The company refurbishes old computers and sells them at a lower price.
这家公司翻新旧电脑并以较低的价格出售。

sentences.sentence: With the help of her childhood friend Jacob Black, Bella refurbishes an old motorbike to carry her on her adventures.
sentences.translation: 随着她的童年好友雅各布·布莱克，贝拉整修旧摩托车进行她的冒险她的帮助。

sentences.sentence: At its facility in Roseville, California, workers first check discarded computers and printers to see if they can be re-used: it refurbishes 2.5m devices a year.
sentences.translation: 加利福尼亚州的罗斯维尔工厂里，工人先检查废弃电脑和打印机是否可以重复使用：这样每年能再利用250万设备。
